name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RegExTranslator: Decode RegEx in your browser

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays a translator for Regular Expressions to English and back again

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button for RegEx Translator, allowing you to open a new tab that lets you translate back and forth between English and Regular Expressions. Try it now to decode a regular expression, or to construct one with simple English.
